title: 23-year-old accidentally shot on Rosehaven Drive
content:
JACKSON, MS (Mississippi News Now) -
Jackson police responded to an accidental shooting on Rosehaven Drive in Jackson on Thursday morning.
23-year-old Febikin Harris III was shot around 9:40 a.m. A gun was being taken out of a car when it accidentally went off.
Harris is being treated for non-life threatening injuries.
